statements: DELETE FROM pricing_information WHERE price > 50 AND market_trend = 'Stable';
DELETE FROM pricing_information WHERE product_id = 123 AND price = 50.00;
DELETE FROM pricing_information WHERE market_trend = 'High' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
DELETE FROM market_trends WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND market_demand > 100;
DELETE FROM pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Dynamic%' OR strategy_id IN ('223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
DELETE FROM product WHERE product_id = 100 AND product_category = 'Electronic Devices';
